column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Mako says : " I ca n't believe it !
#Text=" Royal Earthbender Guard says : " Stop you ?
#Text=I 'm gon na join you .
#Text=I know where the good stuff is .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Should we do something ?
#Text=" Mako says : " This is n't our battle .
#Text=We have to deliver Zaheer 's message to Korra immediately .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Right .
#Text=Okay , find Korra , deliver message .
#Text=Yeah , this should be easy .
#Text=We just got to get out of the city and get to the desert , then somehow find her in the vast expansive wasteland that goes on for thousands , and thousands , of miles .
#Text=This is n't gon na be easy .
#Text=" Mako says : " We need an airship .
#Text=" Mako says : " Excuse me , may I have your attention please ?
#Text=I 'm with the Republic City Police and I need to commandeer this airship to help the Avatar .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Let me give it a shot .
#Text=Hey , the Queen 's gold 's on the third floor of the palace , second door on the right !
#Text=You just got to know how to talk to 'em , bro .
#Text=" Mako says : " What , they took everything .
#Text=I mean , who rips out a transmission radio ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Some folks just do not have respect for other people 's property .
#Text=Now let 's steal this airship !
#Text=" Mako says : " You know how to fly this thing ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Technically speaking , no .
#Text=But , c'mon , how hard could it be ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Up !
#Text=Up !
#Text=" Bolin says : " I do n't see any up button .
#Text=I see levers and switches , oh , there it is .
#Text="
